slideInfo.slideDescription: Samplings of my professional and personal projects

projects.title: GV AMPP Asset Management
projects.overviewTechList: Angular 12, Typescript, Node.js, CSS/SCSS, HTML5 Supporting technologies: Jenkins, Git/Gitflow, Kubernetes
projects.description: A next-generation media asset management system soon to be available through the GV AMPP cloud-native platform within the GV Media Universe ecosystem. Some of the features will include support for content creators who need to search, edit and organize their media. More information, including additional images and documentation, can be found here.

projects.title: GV Stratus (Web Client)
projects.description: A web-based content management system that aids in video production and editing workflows. It contains a comprehensive toolset that includes video metadata management, search, hierarchical folder organization, high-resolution or proxy access to shared storage content, editing/logging, and more. A complete description and demo can be found here.

projects.title: GV Stratus (Desktop Client)
projects.description: A rich WPF desktop content management system that aids in video production and editing workflows. It contains a comprehensive toolset that includes channel injest and playout, video metadata management, search, hierarchical folder organization, high-resolution or proxy access to shared storage content, editing/logging, and more. A complete description and demo can be found here.

projects.title: Skills Project
projects.overviewTechList: Angular 12, Typescript, Node.js, Angular Material, CSS/SCSS, HTML5, Bootstrap
projects.description: A personal project that displays a resume and credential set for myself and my husband in order to demonstrate proficiency in Angular, Typescript, HTML5, and Angular Material concepts. The website can be found here.
